text: Delbert Martin Shofner (December 11, 1934 â€“ March 11, 2020) was an American football wide receiver. He played for eleven seasons with the Los Angeles Rams and the New York Giants from 1957 to 1967 in the National Football League (NFL). Shofner died on March 11, 2020 in Los Angeles, aged 85.Legendary Giants receiver Del Shofner dies at age 85 ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American football wide receivers Category:Los Angeles Rams players Category:New York Giants players Category:Sportspeople from Texas
title: Del Shofner
